content:
間

        correction: source of truth

when compiling wake.py
        read data/wake.flow ONLY
        do NOT read other .py files for patterns

the test is: can you compile from spec alone?

if the spec is insufficient
        tell me what's missing
        we improve the spec

this is how we validate flow-as-source
        .flow must be complete enough
        or we learn what it needs

間
